Hi Cody,

thanks alot for your feedback about this processor.

I think your=
 problems do match into one of two categories:

1) The StackOverflowError i=
s caused by documents simply being to huge
(Almost 3MB in your case). The c=
lass comments of JerichoExtractor
mentions limiting the document size to be=
 processed by this processor
(I have the limit set to 700kB) Another possib=
le workarround might be
simply increasing your VMs stacksize (using the -Xs=
s command line
option in Suns JVM)

2) Those NullPointerExceptions might si=
mply be caused by a bug in the
jerichoHTML parser library. You can read abo=
ut the bug over there:
http://sourceforge.net/tracker/index.php?func=3Ddeta=
il&aid=3D1597587&group_id=3D101067&atid=3D628968
(and also find a version o=
f the lib that has the mentioned bug
allready fixed linked under the same U=
RL)

Hope this helps you solving your problems.

Regards
  Olaf Freyer

---=
